titles.title: Recognizing the 358th Fighter Group for its outstanding service and bravery during World War II and commending its successor, the 122nd Fighter Wing, for continuing its legacy of excellence in service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 7/14/2008--Introduced. Honors the 358th Fighter Group for its outstanding service and bravery during World War II. Commends its successor, the 122nd Fighter Wing, for continuing its legacy of excellence in service.
